function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High levels of movement within communities can lead to rapid transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases within highly connected communities.","Mitigation":"Implement travel restrictions or health screenings within and between communities to control disease transmission.","Technologies":"Health screening technologies, contact tracing apps, and travel restrictions enforcement systems.","People":"Residents within highly connected communities, travelers between communities, and public health authorities responsible for disease control.","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, and community leaders."},{"Description":"Returning residents and visitors from risk areas can potentially carry infections to their home location or new destination, increasing the risk of disease spread.","Impact":"Introduces new sources of infection and increases the risk of disease transmission in new locations.","Mitigation":"Enforce mandatory testing and quarantine measures for returning residents and visitors from risk areas.","Technologies":"Testing kits, quarantine facilities, and contact tracing apps.","People":"Returning residents, visitors from risk areas, and public health authorities responsible for disease control.","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, and travel companies."}]}
